channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯全面制裁的关键部分
item.description: The United States on Friday issued sweeping sanctions against Russia over the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny and to mark the second anniversary of the invasion of Ukraine, targeting more than 500 people and entities as Washington seeks to increase pressure on Moscow.翻译:周五，美国因反对派领导人阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼之死而对俄罗斯实施全面制裁，并纪念入侵乌克兰两周年，针对超过 500 名个人和实体，华盛顿寻求加大对莫斯科的压力。
item.author: Daphne Psaledakis, David Brunnstrom

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯、中国、阿联酋、土耳其等国家的 93 个实体实施出口限制
item.description: The Biden administration has imposed new trade restrictions on 93 entities from Russia, China, Turkey, the United Arab Emirates, Kyrgyzstan, India and South Korea for supporting Russia's war effort in Ukraine, according to a federal government notice posted online on Friday.翻译:根据周五在线发布的联邦政府通知，拜登政府对来自俄罗斯、中国、土耳其、阿拉伯联合酋长国、吉尔吉斯斯坦、印度和韩国的 93 个实体实施新的贸易限制，以支持俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争努力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 受美国制裁的中国大学前校长出任工业部副部长
item.description: A former head of a Chinese aeronautics university sanctioned by the Trump administration for links with the People's Liberation Army (PLA) has become a deputy of a ministry in charge of advancing Chinese technological innovation.翻译:因与中国人民解放军有联系而受到特朗普政府制裁的中国航空大学前校长已成为负责推进中国技术创新的部委副主任。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中欧就汽车、原材料合作举行会谈
item.description: China and the European Union held talks on progress and cooperation in a number of areas including automobiles and raw materials, China's Ministry of Industry and Information Technology said in a statement.翻译:中国工业和信息化部在一份声明中表示，中国和欧盟就汽车和原材料等多个领域的进展与合作进行了会谈。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 两个中国城市加入香港旅游计划以促进旅游业
item.description: The Chinese cities of Xian and Qingdao have been added to a travel scheme that allows residents to visit Hong Kong in a personal capacity, rather than in a tour group, as the financial hub struggles to revive its economy post-COVID.翻译:中国的西安和青岛等城市已被纳入一项旅行计划，该计划允许居民以个人身份而不是旅游团前往香港，因为香港这个金融中心在新冠疫情后正努力重振经济。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着股市创历史新高，投资者仍纷纷涌入现金
item.description: Investors poured cash into money market funds at the fastest pace on record in the first weeks of the year, and funnelled another $15 billion into equities in the week to Wednesday, Bank of America Global Research said on Friday.翻译:美国银行全球研究部周五表示，今年头几周，投资者以有记录以来最快的速度向货币市场基金注入现金，并在截至周三的一周内，又向股票注入了 150 亿美元。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与NBA之间的紧张关系已成“桥下之水”——篮网队老板
item.description: Joe Tsai, owner of the Brooklyn Nets basketball team, said the NBA is “in a very good place” in its relationship with China, four years after Beijing took games off air following remarks about the 2019 Hong Kong protests by a team executive.翻译:布鲁克林篮网队(Brooklyn Nets)篮球队老板蔡崇信(Joe Tsai)表示，NBA与中国的关系“处于非常好的位置”，四年前，北京因一名球队高管就2019年香港抗议发表言论而停播了比赛。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 早盘竞价：创纪录的世界股市让债券黯淡
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 巴斯夫：中国对欧洲的进口量比以往任何时候都高
item.description: BASF said competition from Chinese rivals shipping their products into European chemical makers' home markets is at unprecedented levels and disruptions of the Red Sea transport route only have a temporarily dampening effect.翻译:巴斯夫表示，来自中国竞争对手将产品运往欧洲化学品制造商国内市场的竞争达到了前所未有的水平，红海运输路线的中断只会产生暂时的抑制作用。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 分析师表示，中国预计将采取渐进方式进一步提振经济
item.description: China is likely to persist with a gradual approach to stimulating its economy even as recent moves by its policymakers are unlikely to revive sentiment without further supply-side reforms and aggressive easing measures, market watchers said.翻译:市场观察人士表示，中国可能会坚持采取渐进的方式刺激经济，尽管如果没有进一步的供给侧改革和积极的宽松措施，其政策制定者最近的举措不太可能重振市场情绪。
item.author: Anisha Sircar

item.title: 中国表示今年的目标是“遏制”外国对台湾的干涉
item.description: China aims to "contain" foreign interference over Taiwan and "resolutely combat" any efforts towards the island's formal independence this year, which is the sensitive 75th anniversary of the founding of communist China, state media said on Friday.翻译:官方媒体周五表示，中国旨在“遏制”外国对台湾的干涉，并“坚决打击”任何谋求台湾正式独立的努力，今年是敏感的中华人民共和国成立75周年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 监管机构表示，特斯拉将在中国产品召回中修复 8,700 辆汽车的软件
item.description: China's market regulator said on Friday that Tesla Inc would fix software in 8,700 vehicles to reduce the chance of accidents.翻译:中国市场监管机构周五表示，特斯拉公司将修复 8,700 辆汽车的软件，以减少发生事故的可能性。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国开发商债权人计划首次起诉国有股东索要会费
item.description: A group of offshore creditors of China South City is set to file a lawsuit against the debt-laden developer's biggest state-owned shareholder for dues, four sources said, in what would be the first such case in the crisis-hit property sector.翻译:四位消息人士称，华南城的一批境外债权人将针对负债累累的开发商最大的国有股东提起诉讼，要求缴纳会费，这将是受危机打击的房地产行业中的首例此类案件。
item.author: Yu Xie

item.title: 中国商飞飞机买家文莱盖洛普航空计划于年底推出
item.description: Brunei-based airline startup GallopAir hopes to start operations by the end of 2024 should Brunei's aviation regulator approve the regional jet made by Chinese state-owned planemaker COMAC it wants to fly in time, the carrier's chief executive said.翻译:总部位于文莱的航空公司初创公司 GallopAir 首席执行官表示，如果文莱航空监管机构批准中国国有飞机制造商中国商飞制造的支线飞机能够及时试飞，该公司希望在 2024 年底前开始运营。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Brenda Goh

item.title: 立法者称台湾之行讨论了美国对乌克兰援助计划的命运
item.description: A stalled U.S. bill on military aid to Ukraine which will also help fund weapons for Taiwan was discussed this week during a visit to Taipei by U.S. lawmakers, two of the participants said on Friday.翻译:两名与会者周五表示，美国议员本周访问台北期间讨论了一项陷入僵局的美国向乌克兰提供军事援助的法案，该法案也将为台湾的武器提供资金。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 新冠疫情后的繁荣引发了希望，新加坡航展人数创历史新高
item.description: Record numbers attended the trade section of the first fully post-pandemic Singapore Airshow this week, with exhibitors and delegates optimistic about the aviation industry despite suppliers' struggles to keep up with rebounding travel demand.翻译:本周，参加疫情后首届新加坡航展贸易部分的人数创历史新高，尽管供应商难以跟上旅行需求的反弹，但参展商和代表对航空业持乐观态度。
item.author: Xinghui Kok

item.title: 报告称中国“龙”婴儿潮可能会在2024年增加人口
item.description: More babies are being born in hospitals across China in the Year of the Dragon, financial news outlet Yicai reported, an increase which could soften the decline in population in 2024 and bring cheer to policymakers.翻译:据财经新闻媒体第一财经报道，龙年中国各地的医院将有更多婴儿出生，这一增长可能会缓解 2024 年人口下降的趋势，并给政策制定者带来欢呼。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于梅西的影响，中国取消了比赛，阿根廷转而与美国进行友谊赛
item.description: Argentina will play two matches in the United States next month after Chinese sporting authorities cancelled friendlies featuring the World Cup champions amid a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in an Inter Miami match in Hong Kong.翻译:由于莱昂内尔·梅西未能参加国际迈阿密在香港举行的比赛，中国体育当局取消了与世界杯冠军的友谊赛，阿根廷队将于下个月在美国进行两场比赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 渣打银行宣布大规模回购，首席执行官哀叹股价“糟糕”，股价上涨
item.description: Standard Chartered PLC Chief Executive Bill Winters on Friday bluntly acknowledged the bank's underwhelming share price and vowed to fix it as the lender announced increased dividends, a fresh $1 billion buyback and an 18% increase in annual profit.翻译:渣打银行(Standard Chartered PLC)首席执行官比尔·温特斯(Bill Winters)周五直言不讳地承认该行股价低迷，并誓言要解决这个问题，因为该银行宣布增加股息、新的10亿美元回购以及年度利润增长18%。
item.author: Selena Li, Lawrence White

item.title: 独家：中国警察在夏威夷太平洋邻国基里巴斯工作
item.description: Chinese police are working in the remote atoll nation of Kiribati, a Pacific Ocean neighbour of Hawaii, with uniformed officers involved in community policing and a crime database program, Kiribati officials told Reuters.翻译:基里巴斯官员告诉路透社，中国警察正在偏远的环礁国家基里巴斯工作，基里巴斯是夏威夷的太平洋邻国，身穿制服的警察参与社区治安和犯罪数据库项目。
item.author: Kirsty Needham
